ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] GLBT Guilds
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a female-only guild on Sol Ro called Amazons of Norrath, and about the time I left them a splinter group was imminent.  However, it wasn t a lesbian
ygData.messageBody:
There is a female-only guild on Sol Ro called Amazons of Norrath, and about the time I left them a splinter group was imminent. However, it wasn't a lesbian guild, and only a few members (myself among them) were adamant about keeping the guild female only.

Reason I left? When I left, I was 45th, average lvl was about 23, closest to me was 40th. I left and joined an uber guild.

-Kirei Tokage, Sol Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: Christina Norman [SMTP:tina@...]
Sent: Saturday, March 03, 2001 4:29 PM
To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] GLBT Guilds


I have heard of small lesbian/women-only guilds, I was in one myself. I
think primarily for demographic reasons they are difficult to get off the
ground. I have no problem playing with boys personally, so I'm happy to be
in guilds with boys.

- Christina

On Sat, 3 Mar 2001, October wrote:
> Which begs a question - does anyone know of a lesbian guild? I had a Family
> member ask me in-game the other night if I knew of any womyn's guilds in EQ,
> and I didn't know of any. I pointed her to this list, but I've not heard of
> any.
>
> Happy hunting, and welcome to EQRainbow!
>
>
> Jack
> Ordo Ursi Prismatus
> Field Officer and Swiss Army Knife (Shaman)
> october31@...
